languages.text:
Это один из основных параметров оружия, представляющий собой процент, на который может быть уменьшен показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}брони{/g} противника. Этот параметр влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}расчет урона{/g} атак.
Значение <b>пробития брони<b> указано в описании оружия.
languages.original_text: One of the main parameters of a weapon — it represents the percentage by which the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} can be reduced. This parameter affects the calculation of attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The value of armour penetration is indicated in the description of the weapon.

traits.locale_text:
Это один из основных параметров оружия, представляющий собой процент, на который может быть уменьшен показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}брони{/g} противника. Этот параметр влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}расчет урона{/g} атак.
Значение пробития брони указано в описании оружия.

Это один из основных параметров оружия, представляющий собой процент, на который может быть уменьшен показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}брони{/g} противника. Этот параметр влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}расчет урона{/g} атак.
Значение пробития брони указано в описании оружия.

languages.text: One of the main parameters of a weapon — it represents the percentage by which the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} can be reduced. This parameter affects the calculation of attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The value of armour penetration is indicated in the description of the weapon.
languages.original_text:
Это один из основных параметров оружия, представляющий собой процент, на который может быть уменьшен показатель {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}брони{/g} противника. Этот параметр влияет на {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}расчет урона{/g} атак.
Значение <b>пробития брони<b> указано в описании оружия.

traits.locale_text: One of the main parameters of a weapon — it represents the percentage by which the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}armour{/g} can be reduced. This parameter affects the calculation of attack {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. The value of armour penetration is indicated in the description of the weapon.

One of the main parameters of a weapon — it represents the percentage by which the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} can be reduced. This parameter affects the calculation of attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The value of armour penetration is indicated in the description of the weapon.

One of the main parameters of a weapon — it represents the percentage by which the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} can be reduced. This parameter affects the calculation of attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The value of armour penetration is indicated in the description of the weapon.

languages.text: Einer der wichtigsten Parameter einer Waffe. Er repräsentiert den Prozentsatz, um den die feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} reduziert werden kann. Dieser Parameter betrifft die Berechnung des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Angriffsschadens{/g}. Der Wert der Rüstungsdurchdringung wird in der Waffenbeschreibung angegeben.
languages.original_text: One of the main parameters of a weapon — it represents the percentage by which the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} can be reduced. This parameter affects the calculation of attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The value of armour penetration is indicated in the description of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: Einer der wichtigsten Parameter einer Waffe — er repräsentiert den Prozentsatz, um den die feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} reduziert werden kann. Dieser Parameter betrifft die Berechnung des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}Angriffsschadens{/g}. Der Wert der {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} wird in der Waffenbeschreibung angegeben.

languages.text: L'un des principaux paramètres d'une arme. Il représente le pourcentage de réduction de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de l'ennemi et détermine le calcul des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} d'attaque. La valeur de pénétration d'armure est indiquée dans la description de l'arme.
languages.original_text: One of the main parameters of a weapon — it represents the percentage by which the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} can be reduced. This parameter affects the calculation of attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The value of armour penetration is indicated in the description of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: L'un des principaux paramètres d'une arme, il représente le pourcentage de réduction de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} de l'ennemi. Ce paramètre affecte le calcul des {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}dégâts{/g} d'attaque. La valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g} est indiquée dans la description de l'arme.

languages.text: 武器的主要属性之一，代表可以穿透敌方{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}的百分比。此项属性会影响攻击{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}计算。 护甲穿透值可以在武器描述中看到。
languages.original_text: One of the main parameters of a weapon — it represents the percentage by which the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} can be reduced. This parameter affects the calculation of attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The value of armour penetration is indicated in the description of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: 武器的主要属性之一，代表可以穿透敌方{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}的百分比。此项属性会影响攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}计算。 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}值可以在武器描述中看到。

languages.original_text: One of the main parameters of a weapon — it represents the percentage by which the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Absorption}armour{/g} can be reduced. This parameter affects the calculation of attack {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}. The value of armour penetration is indicated in the description of the weapon.

languages.text: Uno de los parámetros principales del arma. Representa el porcentaje en el que reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del enemigo. Afecta al cálculo del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} de los ataques. El valor de penetración de armadura se indica en la descripción del arma.
languages.original_text: One of the main parameters of a weapon — it represents the percentage by which the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} can be reduced. This parameter affects the calculation of attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The value of armour penetration is indicated in the description of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: Uno de los parámetros principales del arma. Representa el porcentaje en el que reduce la {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} del enemigo. Afecta al cálculo del {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}daño{/g} de los ataques. El valor de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} se indica en la descripción del arma.

languages.text: 主要な武器パラメータの一つであり、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が剥がれるパーセンテージを表す。このパラメータは攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の計算に影響する。 アーマー貫通の値は武器の説明に表示されている。
languages.original_text: One of the main parameters of a weapon — it represents the percentage by which the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} can be reduced. This parameter affects the calculation of attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The value of armour penetration is indicated in the description of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: 主要な武器パラメータの一つであり、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}が剥がれるパーセンテージを表す。このパラメータは攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}ダメージ{/g}の計算に影響する。 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}の値は武器の説明に表示されている。

languages.text: Silahların ana parametrelerinden biridir. Düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} değerinin ne oranda düşürülebileceğini gösterir. Bu parametre, saldırının vereceği {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarın{/g} hesaplanmasına etki eder. Zırh delme değeri, silahın açıklamasında belirtilir.
languages.original_text: One of the main parameters of a weapon — it represents the percentage by which the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} can be reduced. This parameter affects the calculation of attack {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. The value of armour penetration is indicated in the description of the weapon.
